trans-unit.source: Represents the <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.DSA" /> private key of the <see langword="<KeyInfo>" /> element.
trans-unit.target: Representa a chave privada <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.DSA" /> do elemento <see langword="<KeyInfo>" />.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.KeyInfo> class represents the `<KeyInfo>` element, which contains a <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.DSA> public key.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.KeyInfo> classe representa o `<KeyInfo>` elemento, que contém um <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.DSA> chave pública.

trans-unit.source: Use <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.DSAKeyValue> to identify the public key that corresponds to the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.DSA> private key that was used to create the digital signature.
trans-unit.target: Use <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.DSAKeyValue> para identificar a chave pública que corresponde do <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.DSA> chave particular que foi usada para criar a assinatura digital.

trans-unit.source: If a key is not explicitly supplied to the constructor, a new <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.DSA> key pair is randomly generated.
trans-unit.target: Se uma chave não for fornecida explicitamente para o construtor, um novo <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.DSA> par de chaves é gerado aleatoriamente.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.DSAKeyValue> class is used with XML signatures.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.DSAKeyValue> classe é usada com assinaturas XML.

trans-unit.source: For more information about the W3C specification, see http://www.w3.org/TR/xmldsig-core/.
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre a especificação do W3C, consulte http://www.w3.org/TR/xmldsig-core/.

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.DSAKeyValue> class in XML encryption to create a detached signature.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir demonstra como usar o <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.DSAKeyValue> classe na criptografia de XML para criar uma assinatura separada.

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.DSAKeyValue> class in XML encryption to create an envelope signature.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir demonstra como usar o <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.DSAKeyValue> classe na criptografia de XML para criar uma assinatura de envelope.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.DSAKeyValue" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.DSAKeyValue" />.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.DSAKeyValue" /> class with a new, randomly-generated <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.DSA" /> public key.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.DSAKeyValue" /> com uma nova chave pública <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.DSA" /> gerada aleatoriamente.

trans-unit.source: When creating a new <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.DSA> key, this constructor uses the default implementation of <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.DSA> as defined by the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CryptoConfig> class.
trans-unit.target: Ao criar um novo <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.DSA> chave, este construtor usa a implementação padrão de <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.DSA> conforme definido pelo <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CryptoConfig> classe.

trans-unit.source: The instance of an implementation of the <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.DSA" /> class that holds the public key.
trans-unit.target: A instância de uma implementação da classe <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.DSA" /> que contém a chave pública.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.DSAKeyValue" /> class with the specified <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.DSA" /> public key.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.DSAKeyValue" /> com a chave pública <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.DSA" /> especificada.

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.DSAKeyValue> class in XML encryption.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir demonstra como usar o <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.DSAKeyValue> classe na criptografia de XML.

trans-unit.source: Returns the XML representation of a <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.DSAKeyValue" /> element.
trans-unit.target: Retorna a representação XML de um elemento <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.DSAKeyValue" />.

trans-unit.source: The XML representation of the <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.DSAKeyValue" /> element.
trans-unit.target: A representação XML do elemento <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.DSAKeyValue" />.

trans-unit.source: Use this method to output XML for a <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.DSAKeyValue> object.
trans-unit.target: Use esse método para a saída XML para um <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.DSAKeyValue> objeto.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the key value represented by a <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.DSA" /> object.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o valor de chave representado por um objeto <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.DSA" />.

trans-unit.source: The public key represented by a <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.DSA" /> object.
trans-unit.target: A chave pública, representada por um <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.DSA" /> objeto.

trans-unit.source: This property represents the DSA key used to sign the XML.
trans-unit.target: Esta propriedade representa a chave DSA usada para assinar o XML.

trans-unit.source: The XML element to load the <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.DSAKeyValue" /> state from.
trans-unit.target: O elemento XML do qual carregar o estado <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.DSAKeyValue" />.

trans-unit.source: Loads a <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.DSAKeyValue" /> state from an XML element.
trans-unit.target: Carrega um estado <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.DSAKeyValue" /> de um elemento XML.

trans-unit.source: This method can be used to add XML elements to a <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.DSAKeyValue> object.
trans-unit.target: Esse método pode ser usado para adicionar elementos XML para uma <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.DSAKeyValue> objeto.

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="value" /> parameter is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: O parâmetro <paramref name="value" /> é <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="value" /> parameter is not a valid <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.DSAKeyValue" /> XML element.
trans-unit.target: O parâmetro <paramref name="value" /> não é um elemento XML <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.DSAKeyValue" /> válido.
